title: She Chose to Love
description: Inspirational and empowering! “She chose to love” is a tale of self-reliance, healing, honing self-love and the strength of concious intent. This mesmerising poetry collection is hard to put down and will leave you touched and transformed. “She chose to love” encourages self-acceptance, following your own path and rediscovering the thirst for life. It inspires standing up for yourself, experiencing joy and feelings of inner freedom through a series of engaging and memorable poems.“She chose to love” is written for you. For you to find ways to reclaim flourishing, blooming and tap into your inner spring. For you to awaken the power inside of you. May these poems gift you hope and unleash love, for yourself and for the world.Let the tale of your life unfold.Love, Yvette
author: Yvette Dulo
